requirement_tested: Display a dashboard interface with mint cream background and teal-stonented components
user_persona: A finance manager accessing the dashboard for the first time.
user_goal: To visually confirm that the dashboard has a professional look with correct color theming.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens her browser and navigates to the financial dashboard URL. She expects to see a clean interface with consistent styling.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to dashboard homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page loads with mint cream background and teal-themed UI components including headers, cards, and navigation elements.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Navigation
narrative_steps.description: Sarah clicks on a navigation item to switch sections and notices how the active state changes.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a navigation menu item.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Selected menu item is highlighted in teal indicating active state.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Interactive Elements
narrative_steps.description: Curious about interactivity, Sarah hovers over a button to observe its behavior.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a teal-themed button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Button shows subtle hover effect such as darkened background or enhanced shadow.

requirement_tested: Support multi-company financial data collection and storage
user_persona: A system administrator responsible for maintaining company data integrity.
user_goal: To verify that financial data from multiple companies is properly stored in the database.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Database Schema
narrative_steps.description: Alex accesses the backend database to inspect if company and financial data schemas match documented requirements.
narrative_steps.action: Query database schema tables 'companies' and 'financial_data'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tables exist with defined fields and relationships: 'company_id' linking 'companies' and 'financial_data'.

requirement_tested: Show individual company financial data in browseable format
user_persona: An analyst reviewing quarterly performance of a specific company.
user_goal: To view paginated financial data for a selected company without full page reloads.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Financial Data Table
narrative_steps.description: Jamie selects a company from the dropdown and sees a tabular view of its financial data.
narrative_steps.action: Select a company from the company selector dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tabular view updates to show financial data specific to the selected company.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Through Pages
narrative_steps.description: Noticing there's more data than fits on one page, Jamie uses pagination controls to navigate forward.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Next' pagination button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Next page of financial data loads dynamically without refreshing the entire page.

requirement_tested: Provide consolidated financial reports across all companies
user_persona: A CFO preparing for an executive meeting needing overall financial summaries.
user_goal: To get up-to-date consolidated financial reports for presentation purposes.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Consolidated Reports Section
narrative_steps.description: Taylor navigates to the consolidated reports section after logging in.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the 'Reports' section and click on 'Consolidated Summary'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Displays aggregated financial summaries in both tabular and chart formats.

narrative_steps.title: Refreshing Report Data
narrative_steps.description: Wanting the most current figures, Taylor decides to manually refresh the report.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Refresh' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Report regenerates using latest available input data and updates display immediately.

requirement_tested: Enable cross-company financial data comparison functionality
user_persona: A business strategist evaluating market positioning among competitors.
user_goal: To compare profitability metrics across several companies visually.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Up Comparison
narrative_steps.description: Jordan selects two companies from a list and chooses 'Profit' as the metric to compare.
narrative_steps.action: Check boxes for two companies and select 'Profit' from metric dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Bar graph updates to show profit comparison between selected companies over time.

narrative_steps.title: Analyzing Graph Details
narrative_steps.description: Looking closely at the chart, Jordan hovers over bars to get exact numbers.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a segment of the comparison chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tooltip appears showing precise value and label for hovered data point.

requirement_tested: Include financial management tools for user interaction
user_persona: An operations lead who needs to make corrections to financial entries.
user_goal: To edit incorrect financial data efficiently using built-in tools.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Management Tools
narrative_steps.description: Casey identifies a row in the financial table that requires correction and looks for editing options.
narrative_steps.action: Find the 'Edit' icon in the row actions toolbar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Row contains actionable icons like 'Edit', 'Delete', etc., styled consistently.

narrative_steps.title: Performing Edit Action
narrative_steps.description: Casey clicks the edit icon to open a form for modifying the entry.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Edit' icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Modal form opens pre-filled with existing data for adjustment.

requirement_tested: Offer reporting capabilities for financial data analysis
user_persona: A department head preparing monthly analytics reports.
user_goal: To generate and download a customized financial report for internal review.

narrative_steps.title: Configuring Report Parameters
narrative_steps.description: Morgan goes to the report generator and sets desired filters and format.
narrative_steps.action: Choose report type, date range, and output format (e.g., PDF).
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form fields allow selection of criteria needed for report generation.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Final Report
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with settings, Morgan initiates the report creation process.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System processes request and automatically downloads the formatted report file.

requirement_tested: Implement company selection mechanism for viewing specific financial data
user_persona: A portfolio manager tracking investments across various firms.
user_goal: To quickly switch between views of different companies’ financial statuses.

narrative_steps.title: Identifying Selector Component
narrative_steps.description: Riley arrives at the dashboard and notices a dropdown near the top for choosing companies.
narrative_steps.action: Locate and click the company selector dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dropdown expands showing a list of registered companies fetched from backend.

narrative_steps.title: Switching Company Views
narrative_steps.description: Riley picks another company from the list to examine its finances.
narrative_steps.action: Select a different company from the dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Displayed financial data and related components instantly update to reflect newly selected company.

requirement_tested: Display real-time or periodic financial data updates
user_persona: A trader monitoring live financial movements for investment decisions.
user_goal: To ensure displayed financial data stays current without manual intervention.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Auto-Update Mechanism
narrative_steps.description: Pat waits passively while watching financial data panels, expecting automatic refreshes.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for configured interval duration (e.g., 5 minutes).
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Financial data automatically updates either via WebSocket or scheduled polling.

narrative_steps.title: Manually Triggering Refresh
narrative_steps.description: Impatient for new data, Pat hits the manual refresh button instead of waiting.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Manual Refresh' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Current financial data immediately reloads regardless of auto-update schedule.

requirement_tested: Provide filtering options for financial data by date ranges
user_persona: A compliance officer auditing past fiscal periods.
user_goal: To isolate financial records falling within specific historical date spans.

narrative_steps.title: Using Date Picker Controls
narrative_steps.description: Dana locates the date range picker above a financial data table and sets start/end dates.
narrative_steps.action: Open date range picker and enter custom start and end dates.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Picker allows accurate date selection and reflects chosen values visually.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: With dates set, Dana applies the filter to narrow down the data shown.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Apply Filter' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Table contents update to show only records matching selected date range.

requirement_tested: Include export functionality for financial reports
user_persona: A researcher gathering data for academic publication.
user_goal: To export filtered financial datasets into usable document formats.

narrative_steps.title: Preparing Export Options
narrative_steps.description: Quinn finishes analyzing data and now wants to export it for offline use.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to export toolbar and choose preferred format (e.g., Excel).
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Export toolbar presents available formats including PDF, Excel (.xlsx), and CSV.

narrative_steps.title: Downloading File
narrative_steps.description: Having picked Excel, Quinn proceeds to trigger the actual download.
narrative_steps.action: Click the selected export option.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: File matching current view configuration begins downloading automatically.

requirement_tested: Support user authentication and authorization for dashboard access
user_persona: A new employee gaining first-time access to the financial dashboard.
user_goal: To securely log in and gain appropriate level of dashboard access.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Credentials
narrative_steps.description: Taylor reaches the login screen and enters assigned username and password.
narrative_steps.action: Enter valid username and password into respective fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Fields accept input and enable submission upon completion.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Login Request
narrative_steps.description: Confident in accuracy, Taylor submits the login form.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Credentials validated against stored hashes; successful authentication redirects to dashboard with role-based permissions applied.

requirement_tested: Maintain audit trails for financial data modifications
user_persona: An IT security auditor verifying data integrity practices.
user_goal: To confirm all financial edits are tracked and auditable.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Audit Logs
narrative_steps.description: Rey logs in with administrative privileges and accesses the audit trail viewer.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to audit logs section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Audit log viewer displays chronological record of all financial data modifications.

requirement_tested: Enable customizable dashboard views for different user preferences
user_persona: A senior analyst preferring personalized dashboard layout.
user_goal: To tailor dashboard appearance and default filters according to personal workflow.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Customization Panel
narrative_steps.description: Nina clicks the gear icon to adjust her dashboard setup.
narrative_steps.action: Click the gear icon in upper right corner.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Customization modal dialog opens with layout and preference adjustment options.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Layout Preferences
narrative_steps.description: After rearranging widgets and setting favorite filters, Nina saves her preferences.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Save Preferences' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout and filter selections are persisted under Nina’s user profile for future sessions.

requirement_tested: Integrate data visualization components for financial metrics display
user_persona: A marketing director interpreting ROI trends through visuals.
user_goal: To interact with charts to understand deeper insights behind financial KPIs.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Visual Representations
narrative_steps.description: Kai examines revenue trend charts placed within dashboard panels.
narrative_steps.action: View integrated charts showing key financial indicators.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Charts render smoothly using D3.js or Chart.js with labeled axes and legends.

narrative_steps.title: Engaging With Tooltips
narrative_steps.description: Kai moves cursor over chart elements to see numeric breakdowns.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over chart elements.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Detailed tooltips appear showing exact numerical values and contextual labels.

narrative_steps.title: Drilling Down Into Data
narrative_steps.description: Interested in specifics, Kai clicks a chart area to explore underlying data.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a chart element.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirect occurs to detailed page or expanded layer revealing additional data depth.
